text: Smokey and the Bandit II is a 1980 American action comedy movie directed by Hal Needham, and starring Burt Reynolds, Jackie Gleason, Jerry Reed, Dom DeLuise, Sally Field, Mike Henry, Paul Williams and Pat McCormick. The movie is the second installment of the Smokey and the Bandit trilogy in the Smokey and the Bandit franchise and a sequel to Smokey and the Bandit (1977). == Other websites == * * * Category:1980 action movies Category:1980 comedy movies Category:American action movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Universal Pictures movies Category:Trucker movies Category:Movies set in Texas Category:Movies directed by Hal Needham
title: Smokey and the Bandit II
